title: (VIDEO) MynaGoGama protest site attacked
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The MynaGoGama protest site opposite Temple Trees was attacked by a group moments after Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa addressed the SLPP Local Government Members Forum and its members on Monday (9).
The tents opposite Temple Trees was dismantled by a mob. The MynaGoGama protest site was set up demanding the resignation of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa.
‘Ready to make any sacrifice for the people’ – Sri Lankan PM Mahinda Rajapaksa
‘If the Prime Minister resigns it would create a political crisis,’ – Johnston
